root.name: Quattro Arcade
root.description: OverviewCJ's Elephant Antics This is a normal platform game that is about a baby elephant named Columbus Jumbo finding his way home to Africa. Items:Bananas and Cakes:Collect them to earn points.Maps:When you beat the boss at the end of a stage, you will earn this item.Fizzy Drink:You drink this to increase your characters speed.Bombs:You collect and throw them to attack. F-16 RenegadeThis game is an action shooter where you have to destroy the enemies coming toward you. Go! Dizzy Go!The game is considered to be an arcade puzzle game similar to the style of the Adventures of Lolo games. Stunt BuggiesThis is a game where you have to drive around in a stunt buggy, collect the required items, and avoid the obstacles.
